title: KPDH Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of the K-Pop Demon Hunter Organization!

questions.question: What does KPDH stand for?
questions.explanation: KPDH - K-Pop Demon Hunters - is the secret organization of idol hunters who protect humanity from supernatural threats!

questions.question: The KPDH was founded in Seoul in 1999 after the 'Midnight Concert Incident'.
questions.explanation: The organization was founded after demons attacked a massive Y2K concert, leading to the creation of KPDH to train idol hunters!

questions.question: What power source do KPDH hunters channel to fight demons?
questions.explanation: Hunters channel the emotional energy of fans (응원/eungwon) - the cheers and love from supporters power their abilities!

questions.question: How many members are in a standard KPDH hunter unit?
questions.explanation: Hunter units typically have 4-7 members to balance combat roles: Leader, Main Vocal (healer), Main Dancer (melee), Rapper (ranged), and support positions!

questions.question: KPDH hunters disguise their training as idol training programs.
questions.explanation: The perfect cover! KPDH operates through entertainment companies, with 'trainee programs' actually being demon hunting academies!

questions.question: What is a 'Comeback' in KPDH terminology?
questions.explanation: In KPDH, a 'Comeback' is code for a major mission. The music release serves as both cover story and power amplifier!

questions.question: What is the KPDH headquarters hidden beneath?
questions.explanation: KPDH HQ is hidden beneath a famous entertainment company - the perfect cover for all the young people coming and going!

questions.question: Lightsticks are actually enchanted weapons used by hunters.
questions.explanation: Fan lightsticks are mass-produced enchanted items! When fans wave them at concerts, they create protective barriers and amplify hunter power!
